title: For those who want an idea what the Alpha client looks like.
body:
So basically i was one of the people allowed into the new Alpha client, and i thought i would give everyone a look.

http://i.imgur.com/eZIFdHS.jpg
http://i.imgur.com/QhxcCiC.png

It looks fairly amazing, there are bugs, but that is to be expected, and i'm sure it will be a great client when it comes out.

replies.body:
I was keen to test it out as I was approved but I realised that I needed a PBE account. I have been on the waiting list for years and still no luck getting a pbe account. Unless moving to oce somehow deleted the application.
Oh well. I'll just have to wait until it comes out.
PBE account isn't required for this alpha signup.
You need a pbe installation for the alpha client. I tried to install it but the installer wants a pbe instalation.
No.
Yes the version that the email had linked required a PBE account but the version from the oce download only requires a normal LOL install.

I don't have a PBE account, and i have access, so either you got access to the PBE server (which is not related to this, PBE server and this are very separate at this time.) or your not fully informed on what your talking about.

The link in the email goes straight to this http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/client-update/download

I do not know where you signed up, but you did it wrong.

Hey, try applying for the Alpha client through here

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/EzTL469v-league-client-update-alpha-sign-ups-now-open

Riot announced it about 3 weeks ago

Good luck :)
Happy you like it. I personally think it is beautiful and love it :)

Hey Mirkinen, as an aside, can we get an Alpha discussion button on boards (whether available to everyone or only those in the alpha is up to you guys.)

Kind of annoying that i have no real way to get there without going back in my posts or finding the link again.

Hey Jason, you should be able to get to it through the home page in the alpha client. We've chosen to keep it a bit more hidden because we don't really want players that aren't in the Alpha to see all this discussion that they can't really be a part of yet, that's not the best experience for them.

I know i can, thing is till things are added, it's not really going to be a thing i use all the time (probably take a glance at it every update)

Currently a decent amount of features that i use regularly aren't able to be used in the new client, so i'd rather be able to access it from here.

Yeah its definitely not for general every day use at the moment. But we do hope you continue to regularly jump in to help with testing and offering feedback and reporting bugs! thats the main point of the current alpha cycle.
omg my friend pj is on you friends list
So how did people get in the Alpha Client in the first place? I'm talking to a friend atm and he has no idea how he got in so i was wondering if it was random or now.

it was a sign up

http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/client-update

I'd love a legacy option. I may be in the minority, but I love the design and simplicity of the current client.

The client being customizable with colours would be nice as well. I want a nice purple background.

The problem is the current client is (to put it nicely) terrible, and is coded not the best, hence why they are starting from the ground (and i mean the ground, all you have is the Alpha screen and the game screen.) up with a new client.
The profile pages also look incredible. Can't wait to show off that DJ Sona splash art.
Looks cool. Especially the way that the champ splash arts kinda take up the whole skin, but fade out around the edges.

Just a question for the Rioters, why does OCE come up as "OC1" in the region select of the alpha launcher?

LoL will shut down *long* before you guys ever even consider a second OCE server, so why the need for numbering it?
This makes me sad... Feel like this game is just becoming so "modern" with the new boards and client... takes away from the nostalgic feel :(
I got it but I ain't even bothered to use it yet this client should of came out at least 2 seasons ago tbh
